setting.groupOrgTitle: The Young Wizards' School for Arcane Excellence
setting.groupGeneralPurpose: You're learning to harness and hone your **Gift**.
setting.currentSituationProblem: A **DARK CURSE** has fallen upon the Headmistresss, leaving the staff and faculty in an uproar; classes are still in session, but all the distraction makes a great opportunity for *magic and mischief!*

inventory: a school uniform (comfortable, durable, with lots of pockets)
a magical focus (amulet, ring, want, or some other item; used for casting spells)
a familiar (a small creature, maybe alive, maybe clockwork, maybe magic; good for sending messages, amongst other things)
goals: Break Free From Your Family's Legacy

flaws: **Dangerous Environs** (the area around the school is home to monsters ... or worse)
**Far From Home** (secluded and cut-off from most other comforts)
**Poorly Funded** (low supplies and many things old and worn-out)
**Unpleasent Rivalries** (student Houses or classes often cause trouble for others)
**Very Attentive Staff** (always on the lookout for wayward students)

exact.label: MAGICAL MISCHIEF
exact.description: You get a special insight into what's going on. Ask the storyteller a question and they'll answer you honestl

samplePrompts: The Clockwork Custodian is clattering closer to your hiding spot. What do you do?
Professor Greywand is about to read the note you tried to slip to Winona. What do you do?
sampleQuestions: Do any of you have experience with Fire Drakes? How? What happened?
